Kenzoschool Boke Flower Slip-on Sneakers.text: An iconic sneaker that evokes the designer's Japanese heritage with a signature boke flower that decorates the upper proudly. Crafted from canvas, the slip-on silhouette are topped with elasticated sides which make them easy to put on and slide off,.

Kenzoschool High-top Sneakers in Canvas.text: Kenzo's high-top sneakers reference retro-skate culture. Crafted in Thailand, the sneakers are set on a graphic rubber sole and have a canvas upper with BOKE FLOWER embroidery and a military-inspired tag engraved with the address of Kenzo's Paris headquarters.

Kenzo Hoops Sneakers in Leather.text: Kenzo's Hoops sneakers bring retro basketball style to the street. Designed in Paris, the sneakers are set on a chunky rubber sole and topped with smooth leather uppers with perforations and a metal tab at the toe.

Kenzoschool Laceless Sneakers in Coated.text: Kenzo's slip-on sneakers are decorated with a labels motif, which first appeared in a runway show in the 1980s. Printed on the canvas upper, the artwork adds a colourful vintage touch, while the graphic rubber sole and cotton lining ensure comfort.

Kenzoschool Low Top Sneakers in Canvas.text: Kenzo's low-top sneakers reference retro-skate culture. Crafted in Thailand, the sneakers are set on a graphic rubber sole and have a canvas upper with BOKE FLOWER embroidery and a military-inspired tag engraved with the address of Kenzo's Paris headquarters.

Kenzoswing Low-top Sneakers in Leather.text: The perforations in the smooth leather of the Kenzoswing sneakers creates a K that sits alongside a shimmering logo. Set on a chunky sole that's surprisingly lightweight, the round toe silhouette is fitted with flat laces and finished with a contrasting heel tab.

Logo Low-top Sneakers in Leather.text: Kenzo's sneakers showcase the designer logo in classic and contemporary ways. The low-top sneaker has been crafted from premium leather that features a stamp and perforations to deliver designer cool to these kicks.
